rooms.description: Open-plan living area with large windows for natural light and ventilation. Eco-friendly materials used in construction.

Comfortable bedroom with a view of the garden and swimming pool area.
Attached bathroom, uses water-saving fixtures and eco-friendly materials.
Accessible from the living area with modern design elements.
